comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: "María Barrientos (Catalan: Maria; Barcelona, 10 March 1883 - Ciboure, 8 August 1946) was a Spanish opera singer, a light coloratura soprano, one of the most eminent sopranos of her time." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maria_Barrientos

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: B-59: Thanks for linking to more information on Barrientos. We will add more details to the record.
